channel.title: How to log off/shutdown/restart of with run!
channel.description:
First open run. Then type in logoff.exe, then press enter! To shutdown type in shutdown.exe and press enter...to restart type in restart.exe and press enter.
You can create a BAT file and put in the code.

item.title: How to log off/shutdown/restart of with run!

You can create a BAT file and put in the code.[/quote]
